column5: - Cozy, open floor plan, perfect for 4-8 people.  - Close to children's playground and park.  Easy access (~10-15 minutes) to: - Toyota HQ's, Cowboys Training Facilities, Nebraska Furniture Mart, Liberty Mutual Call Center, FedEx HQ's, T-Mobile, JCPenny, State Farm HQ's, Galleria Mall - Cities of Frisco, Plano, Addison, The Colony, Lewisville, Coppell  Privacy, comfort, kitchen, garage - a better alternative to multiple hotel rooms, outside parking, restaurants.
